sentences.en: Beijing property market cooling small Huxing next year overreach?
sentences.cn: 北京楼市小户型今年过火明年降温?

sentences.en: He had to overreach in order to catch my hand.
sentences.cn: 为了抓住我的手,他不得不把手伸得过长.

sentences.en: It isn't wise to be too clever. Sometimes you overreach yourself.
sentences.cn: 太精明未必好, 有时会弄巧成拙.
该公司的做法超出其经济实力。

sentences.en: The people who sustain the worst losses are usually those who overreach.
sentences.cn: 不自量力者往往摔得最惨。
行为过激就会失去理智.

trans.tran_en: to try to do more than you have the power, ability, or money to do

trans.tran_cn: 因过于雄心勃勃而失败
